## UserWallet.getAddress() method

Get the currently connected address

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAddress(): Promise<string>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;

## Example


```javascript
const address = await sdk.wallet.getAddress();
```
